box_info.first: If traveling is your thing , this is your section. In Mochileros Shop we have designed a line of products specially designed for adventurers and travel lovers.
box_info.second: From the comfort of your apartment it's only one click, it doesn't cost anything. Choose the coolest items for this trip and the coolest souvenirs.
box_info.third: With every reservation you have at your disposal unbelievable offers on many of our products. Don't get confused start your shopping list and save a lot
box_info.forth: Yes, what if! That the purchase is secure and we do not store your cards, your bank connections are encrypted thanks to the SSL protocol.

global.law: Utilizamos cookies y tecnologías similares para ofrecerte la mejor experiencia en cuanto a rendimiento, análisis, personalización y publicidad, y para respaldar el funcionamiento de nuestro sitio. ¿Quieres más información? Lee nuestra política de cookies.

page.shop.create.title: If you are a small business start selling in apatxee
page.shop.create.sentence: Introduce your company NIF and we will verify it. You will receive your payments through our stripe account for marketplace. Remember that we offer a pick-up service and delivery of the product in 1 hour ! Your customers will receive their purchase in 1 hour! Get started!

modal.prevent.wizard.bank_account: Link a bank account with stripe to be able to receive your payments, otherwise you will not be able to publish products.
modal.prevent.wizard.shop_schedule: You must establish a product availability schedule, remember that the shipping service is linked to your store and will search for the product.

modal.location.description: Welcome to Mochileros Shop the exclusive shop for our guests, you will get discounts and exclusive offers. We need you to tell us which floor you are staying on.

modal.location.sentence: You have to give us your street so that we can show you the products for sale that you have around you.
